title: TU-games with utilities: the prenucleolus and its characterization set
abstract:
TU-games with utility functions are considered. Generalizations of the
prenucleolus, essential coalitions and the core: the u-prenucleolus,
u-essential coalitions and the u-core respectively are introduced. We show that
u-essential coalitions form a characterisation set for the u-prenucleolus in
case of games with nonempty u-core.
